name: LaserTime
description:
This game was made for Wowie GameJam 4. 

We are a team of four: 

- Lead Dev: KDDinev18 - Github

- Artist: Martin4ata - Github

- Sound Designer: LazerDynamiX - Github

- Manager: RoyalFang- Github

Lore of the game:

You are a virus that somehow got into a computer and your task now is to stay alive for as long as possible and collect as much energy as you can. You have only 30 seconds to live but every time you collect an energy source, you get 1 more second to live, so be quick about it! You get a few tools which help you survive the firewall of the computer as it tries to delete you. 5 seconds of speed boost which doesn't replenish with time, a way to stop almost immediately and power-ups. They allow you ,to combine or use them on their own, to create new and interesting effects which can help you in your survival.
